title: Why is the COVID situation so bad in Germany and Austria, two countries with almost 90% of population fully vaccinated?
description: Answer (1 of 9): I don't know where you are getting your information from, but wherever it is, you should stop using it as a source. Approximately 63% of Germans are fully vaccinated. The number goes to 67% if you count people who have only had their first shot. The numbers are slightly lower i...
